pause(uint256).details: This function can only pause functionality, and thus cannot 'unflip' any bit in `_paused` from 1 to 0.

params.newPausedStatus: represents the new value for `_paused` to take, which means it may flip several bits at once.

unpause(uint256).details: This function can only unpause functionality, and thus cannot 'flip' any bit in `_paused` from 0 to 1.

params.newPausedStatus: represents the new value for `_paused` to take, which means it may flip several bits at once.

pause(uint256).notice: This function is used to pause an EigenLayer/DataLayer contract's functionality. It is permissioned to the `pauser` address, which is expected to be a low threshold multisig.

paused().notice: Returns the current paused status as a uint256.

paused(uint8).notice: Returns 'true' if the `indexed`th bit of `_paused` is 1, and 'false' otherwise

pauserRegistry().notice: Address of the `PauserRegistry` contract that this contract defers to for determining access control (for pausing).

unpause(uint256).notice: This function is used to unpause an EigenLayer/DataLayercontract's functionality. It is permissioned to the `unpauser` address, which is expected to be a high threshold multisig or goverance contract.

documentation.text: @notice Address of the `PauserRegistry` contract that this contract defers to for determining access control (for pausing).
@dev whether or not the contract is currently paused
@notice Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`, and changed to `newPausedStatus`.
@notice Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`, and changed to `newPausedStatus`.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "msg.sender is not permissioned as pauser"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "msg.sender is not permissioned as unpauser"

documentation.text: @notice Throws if the contract is paused, i.e. if any of the bits in `_paused` is flipped to 1.
@notice Throws if the `indexed`th bit of `_paused` is 1, i.e. if the `index`th pause switch is flipped.

documentation.text: @notice One-time function for setting the `pauserRegistry` and initializing the value of `_paused`.
